name.ch: 海洋地質與地球物理解釋

goal.ch: 學習海洋地質及地球物理探勘基本知識，並瞭解如何解釋資料。
goal.en: Learning fundamental knowledge on marine geological and geophysical methods and their applications.

outline.ch:
“授課內容按上課時間由課程簡介、海洋地質地物的基本知識介紹、震測資料介紹與處理、
海洋地質及地球物理資料解釋，最後是進行個人的上台報告與繳交期末書面報告。“
outline.en:
Fundamental Marine Seismic Data Processing on Landmark Seisspace ProMAX or Radex pro software
Fundamental Marine Seismic Data Interpretations on Kingdom suite or
SLB Petrel software

textbook.en:
“1. Marine Geophysics (1999), E.J.W. Jones, Wiley press, 474 pages, ISBN: 978-0-471-98694-2.
2. Seismic Data Analysis- Processing, Inversion, and Interpretation of Seismic Data (2001),Oz Yilmaz, ISBN: 978-1-56080-158-0 (on-line).
3. Seismic Data Processing 1st Edition, L. Hatton, MH Worthington and J. Makin, ISBN: 978-0632013746.“

gradMethod.ch:
“出席、上課表現：40％
資料處理成果：30％
期末報告：30％“
gradMethod.en:
“Attendancy and Homework: 40％
Final processing results: 30％
Final presentation: 30％“
